Talk_54_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Aha! <sp:5:1:0>I see you made room in your pouch!


Now then, please accept this as thanks
for the Bubbul gem.
Talk_54_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>See, I collect all SORTS of monstrous
treasures... That is, <clr:0000>monster parts<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>goods that make you look like a monster<clr:ffff>.
The mask I gave you was made to look
just like a Bokoblin, so much so that even
a Bokoblin would take you for one.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_02>By all means, do try it on. Then you will
see what it's like to have the body and
the heart of a Bokoblin!
Talk_06_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>Allll I need to do is get my fingers on
a <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>,<sp:5:1:0> then I'm sure to turn
into a Satori!
Talk_06_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>And the rumors are TRUE!<sp:5:0:0> There is a
creature in the cave called a <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff>,
and it glows just like a Satori.
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>Gaaaw, but I didn't think it would be
up sooo high on the wall or run about
all nimbly-bimbly like that.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Oh, traveler! <sp:5:0:0>I still haven't been able to
get my fingers on a Bubbul gem.
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>If I'm going to make my dream come true,
<sp:5:1:0>I must get my fingers on a <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Gawww, but the Bubbulfrog is so very
nimbly-bimbly and hard to catch.
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I need a <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff> to make my
dream come true. <sp:5:1:0>But if I can't catch a
<clr:0000>Bubbulfrog <clr:ffff>what to do, what to dooo?
Talk_53:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>That perfect shape...<sp:5:1:0>and the faint
blue glow...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>It's a...<sp:5:1:0>REAL <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>! Real as can be!<sp:5:1:0>


<snd:Happy_03>Yooou did it! <sp:5:1:0>Now I can transform into a
<clr:0000>Satori <clr:ffff>just like the ones I adore!<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thank you so very much!<sp:5:1:0> Please take this
gifty in return!
Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>At last, at last... <sp:5:1:0>The time has come.
Time to gobble down the <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>!

Cheers and bottoms up...
Talk_33_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>And then I read these ancient texts and
they told me how to transform myself—<sp:5:0:0>
transform ME, KOLTIN—<sp:5:0:0>into a Satori!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_33_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>For it to work, I MUST find a <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff>—<sp:5:0:0>
a straaange creature that loves dark caves
and glows blueish-white like a Satori.
Then I have to collect a <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>,
which is a bauble that <clr:0000>Bubbulfrogs<clr:ffff> drop
when they're feeling weak.
Talk_57:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Gwah?! <sp:5:0:0>My body...<sp:5:0:0>it isn't changing...<sp:5:0:0>
But... BUT I do feel a strange sensation
washing over me.
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_03>It can only mean ONE thing...<sp:5:1:0> I'm on
my way to becoming a Satori!<sp:5:1:0> And
that means...<sp:5:1:0>
Near_01: What am I going to dooo?
Talk_58:
Kilton, Big Brother! <sp:5:1:0>I have decided to set
out on a journey to collect Bubbul gems!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Do you have business in this <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>,
by any chance? <sp:5:0:0>I'm sorry to say,
but right now it's—
Talk_59:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Ease_00>I...see. <sp:5:1:0>Well, it seems you've made up
your mind. That being the case...<sp:5:0:0>
You have my complete support.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>I hope you collect as many Bubbul gems
as you need.
Talk_31:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>YOU want to hear about MY dream?!<sp:0:4:0><snd:Greeting_01>Wellll, it's simple really. I dream of
becoming a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>! You know...the
creature of myth!
Talk_32:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I'm happy to tell you over and over and
OVER again! <sp:5:1:0>My dream—my WISH—is to
become a mythical <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>!
Talk_61:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Traveler! <sp:5:0:0>I am grateful for your help,
but I've decided to set out on a journey
to collect Bubbul gems.
Next time you get your fingers on a
<clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>, please, PLEASE do give
it to me.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_02>If you do, I'll trade you a gifty from
my collection of treasures for it!

And with that...<sp:5:0:0>I hope we meet again
sometime, somewhere!
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Koltin...<sp:5:1:0>


Please. It's impossible...absurd even...to
try to turn yourself into a legendary
creature...<sp:5:1:0> A <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff> no less! Absurd!
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should be working on the monster
collection with me instead of chasing a
silly dream like th—
Talk_33:
<clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff> are legendary creatures that
have been spotted allll over Hyrule.

Piercing eyes...<sp:5:0:0>blueish-white fur...<sp:5:0:0>
Oooh, how I've admired them since
I was a wee Koltin!
Talk_62:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_01>Off he goes... <sp:5:0:0>I do hope he's able to
make his dream come true.<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_34:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>That's why I chased after the Bubbulfrog
lurking in the <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff>. I wanted to get my
fingers on that gem.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>But who knew a Bubbulfrog could gambol
about like that?<sp:5:1:0> So nimbly-bimbly!<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_63:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_01>Now, I have to be on my way as well.<sp:5:0:0> I'll
be making the journey to Tarrey Town
in Akkala.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_00>But dear traveler...<sp:5:0:0>thank you so much for
helping my little brother.

And though I hate to impose, I do hope
that, during your travels, you'll find time
to assist him further.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I will keep my ears wide open for news of
my brother's whereabouts, so visit me in
<clr:0000>Tarrey Town <clr:ffff>if you need help finding him.
Yes, yes, I'll be going now...
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:SurpriseL_00>I will NEVER give up, Kilton! I've always
wanted to be a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>! I WILL be a Satori!
I do NOT care what it takes!
Talk_35:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Ngggyaaat!<sp:5:1:0> I want to be a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>! I WILL
be a Satori! I'll do whatever it takes!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:TalkPositive_01>In that case, Little Brother,<sp:5:0:0> why not get
someone to help you catch a <clr:0000>Bubbulfrog<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Yes! Yes! Do you remember all that
treasure you collected? <sp:5:0:0>You could
offer that in trade.
Talk_21_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Traveler...<sp:5:0:0>did you...<sp:5:0:0>hear me and my
big brother talking?
Talk_36:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Notice_01>Bwaaa...<sp:5:1:0> I'm sorry.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><sp:0:2:2:6400>But that is my wish and my dream and my
reason for doing such doings.

So if you get hold of a <clr:0000>Bubbul gem<clr:ffff>,
pleeease give it to meee! I'll give you
a treasure in trade, I swear.
Talk_57_01:
<snd:Angry>More! <sp:5:1:0>I need more of them!


And I can't just gobble them up one at a
time.<sp:5:0:0> No. That'll never work. I must collect
lots and lots and eat them ALL at once.
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Ease_01>Traveler...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you don't mind, would you lend your
ears to my little brother's plea?

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I fear Koltin can't make his dream come
true without some...eh...<sp:5:0:0>assistance.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting>Traveler, we meet again!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>My little brother still hasn't managed to
make his dream come true. Can I trouble
you to lend him your ears yet again?
Talk_41:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think_00>*sigh* <sp:5:1:0>When oh when will I ever get to be 
a <clr:0000>Satori<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_54_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, <sp:5:1:0>traveler, <sp:5:1:0>it looks like your pouch is
full to the tippy top.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_02>I have this mask that can be worn, and
I SO want to give it to you.<sp:5:0:0> Please come
see me when you've made room for it.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I want nothing more than to help make
my little brother's dream come true.

But if we are speaking honestly...his
dream seems quite impossible.
Talk_54_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>I must thank you for giving me the
Bubbul gem, traveler!

<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me know when you've made room in
your pouch. I want to give you a mask
you can wear to repay your kindness.
